name: TB Report
query:
SELECT 
    t1.date_specimen_received AS "Date specimen Received",
    t1.full_name AS "Full Name",
    t1.age AS "Age",
    t1.sex AS "Sex",
    t1.District AS "District",
    t1.mobile AS "Mobile",
    t1.refer_by AS "Refer by",
    t1.diagnosis AS "Diagnosis",
    t1.follow_upmonth AS "Follow up(month)",
    t1.results AS "Xpert Results",
    t1.result_of_sputum_smear_microscopy AS "Result of sputum Smear Microscopy",
    t1.tbmu_no_after_reg3 AS "TBMU No. (after reg)3",
    t1.hiv_status AS "HIV status",
    t1.date_of_test AS "Date of test",
    t1.remarks AS "Remarks",
    
    t2.full_name AS "Technician Name"
FROM 
    `tabTB Laboratory Register` t1
LEFT JOIN 
    `tabUser` t2
ON 
    t1.labotory_technician_singature = t2.name
WHERE 
    t1.date_specimen_received BETWEEN %(Start_date)s AND %(End_date)s;
